subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin is a full-time driver in Nascar’s premier Sprint Cup series once again, proving that age is only relative in a sport where helmets hide the wrinkles.
snippet: Mark Martin is a full-time driver in Nascar’s premier Sprint Cup series once again, proving that age is only relative in a sport where helmets hide the wrinkles.
